thread.title: Backstrom debuts with 3 points as Caps beat Hurricanes, 4-1
thread.title_full: Backstrom debuts with 3 points as Caps beat Hurricanes, 4-1

author: senh
title: Backstrom debuts with 3 points as Caps beat Hurricanes, 4-1
text: BING NEWS: Backstrom debuts with 3 points as Caps beat Hurricanes, 4-1 WASHINGTON — The Washington Capitals were glad to see Nicklas Backstrom back in the lineup. Backstrom had a goal and two assists in his season debut to lead the Washington Capitals to a 4-1 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on Saturday night. 10/17/2015 - 4:27 pm | View Link NHL trade deadline: Caps looking for winger to join Ovechkin, Backstrom Six points separate them from the division-leading New York Islanders ... As fun as a Jaromir Jagr return to Washington could be (for the rest of us at least -- sorry Caps fans), he's probably not a great option to allow Backstrom and Ovechkin to play ... 10/17/2015 - 11:10 am | View Website Sports News & Articles – Scores, Pictures, Videos Find the latest sports news and articles on the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA college football, NCAA college basketball and more at ABC News. 10/17/2015 - 6:24 am | View Website NHL playoffs: Stepan, Rangers knock off Capitals in OT ... The New York Rangers beat the Washington Capitals in overtime of Game 7 thanks to a shot off the stick of center Derek Stepan. 10/17/2015 - 3:25 am | View Website Aleksandr Ovetchkine — Wikipédia Ovetchkine participe au repêchage d'entrée de 2004 dans la Ligue nationale de hockey et il est sélectionné par les Capitals de Washington en tant que tout premier ... 10/16/2015 - 11:14 pm | View Website Fox 5 NY News | WNYW Fox 5 NY, New York News, Breaking News, weather, sports, traffic and more.
